channel.title: New Clan for Clash of Clans
channel.description:
My brother and I recently made a new clan for clash of clans..
Advertise here: *
Forums: *
Also added clan of the week: It's well explained on OTB community forums!
Make your advertisement, and the first 2 advertisements will get there own categories and forums!
Possibly mini-ranks!
This shows what it would be like: *
Mini-ranks can easily be done, but you'd have to send the picture of your rank.

item.title: New Clan for Clash of Clans
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Hi, this section is for talking about current games. You may not advertise your clan for a game, as that’s not what this section is intended for.

Feel free to discus the game, and then invite people to your clan if they show an interest. Also, feel free to advertise your clan in your signature, however you can’t do it in this post.

Read full topic
item.source: New Clan for Clash of Clans
